name: kanidm
tagline: A modern identity management and directory service for infrastructure
description: Kanidm is an identity management system and LDAP compatible directory service. It aims to provide secure, modern authentication and authorization features for self hosted infrastructure with both CLI and web administration tools.

features.title: Identity Management
features.description: User and group administration with LDAP compatibility and modern authentication protocols. Centralize identity infrastructure

features.title: REST API
features.description: Standards-based authentication for web applications and APIs. Enable single sign-on across services

features.title: Ldap Server
features.description: LDAP-compatible directory service for legacy application integration. Bridge modern and traditional systems

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage identities through command-line tools or web interface. Choose your preferred workflow

features.title: Api Access
features.description: RESTful API for programmatic identity management and automation. Integrate with existing tools

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Comprehensive logs of authentication events and administrative actions. Track security-relevant activities
